column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My wife decided she wanted to go to the beach last summer .
#id=2
#text=We decided the best way to get there would be an airplane .
#id=3
#text=We booked the tickets 3 months in advance to ensure we would have tickets to board the plane to take us to our vacation destination .
#id=4
#text=When the day finally came fly on the airplane , we made sure we arrived at least an hour and a half early .
#id=5
#text=There are many delays before you actually get on board an airplane .
#id=6
#text=First , , you have to go through a metal detector and wait in long lines just to get to the metal detectors .
#id=7
#text=Then you have to check your luggage .
#id=8
#text=After that , you have to go to the terminal and provide proof of a ticket .
#id=9
#text=Once you get on an airplane , you have to prepare for turbulence .
#text=Other than that , flying on an airplane is a safe and efficient way to travel .
#text=When we landed , we went straight to the beach .
